t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: If you meet all eligibility requirements, enroll your brand in the Transparency program. Use the same credentials you use to log in to the Brand Registry portal. If your brand is already enrolled, log in to the Transparency portal to enroll products and add users to your account.

t: What is brand safety? Definition, examples & how it works | Amazon Ads
s: December 20, 2021 - The concept of brand suitability is related to brand safety. Brand safety is about avoiding inappropriate content, and all audiences generally agree upon what falls into those categories. Brand suitability, on the other hand, is unique to an individual brand.
